content: this is my latest design my painted daisies wrap it is made using a scheepjes whirl in lemon cassis cream but you could use any 4 ply yarn and it would work beautifully this pattern is simple to master and it is written in u k terms this sale is for a pdf digital download only not the actual wrap after your purchase you will receive a digital download of the pattern so you can make your very own the pattern includes a written and a simplified chart pattern to help you along my wrap measured 19 inches 48 cm by 66 inches 168 cm after a gentle block enjoy suzy xx
